update t_transfer
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
billno = #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_type = #{tType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_money = #{tMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
old_money = #{oldMoney,jdbcType=REAL},

t_time = #{tTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_counts = #{taskCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_transfer set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, billno = #{billno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_type = #{tType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_money = #{tMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, old_money = #{oldMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, new_money = #{newMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_time = #{tTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cagent = #{cagent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_counts = #{taskCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
